slides.description: In addition to fully implementing the state's health insurance policies, KGS Tech also supports employees with business insurance, accident insurance, and periodic health check-ups.

message.title: Message from CEO Sumimoto
message.subtitle: Together with local communities, we will bring energy...
content: At KGS Tech, we aim to make technology sustainable.
With this in mind, we strive to promote advanced technology solutions.
The reason for this is our recognition of the value of community and future development.
